name: Zombie Run And Gun
description:
Experience an "undeadly" event  in the trench of war with allies and enemies rise from the dead from a mysterious gas dropped in the battlefield. Scavenge any materials you can find and survive the endless night of fight till your last dying breath! What will your high score going to be?

The key features of the game

- very limited resources as the game goes on

- Arcade style surviving and beating to the top of the high score.

-single player

-straight forward/ fast paced

Song credits:
